pr_title: [ML] DF Analytics should always display operational stats

timeline.message:
[ML] DF Analytics should always display operational stats

This commit populates the _stats API response with sensible "empty"
`data_counts` and `memory_usage` objects when the job itself
has not started reporting them.

timeline.author: benwtrent
benwtrent

replies.bodyText: I agree that's too much complexity for the gain. I'll make MemoryUsage.timestamp nullable.
replies.author: dimitris-athanasiou

timeline.author: przemekwitek

replies.bodyText: Well spotted. I ended up not using it and forgot to clean it up.
replies.author: dimitris-athanasiou

timeline.bodyText: What prevents timestamp from being null here?
timeline.author: przemekwitek

replies.bodyText: We should only persist a MemoryUsage object we read from AnalyticsResultProcessor and those should always have a non-null timestamp.
replies.author: dimitris-athanasiou

timeline.author: przemekwitek

timeline.message: No need to assign unused response to local var
